description: divination basket formed by a hollowed out gourd with a fitted lid; various metal attachments through metal rings around the side; the lower part covered in skin and metal circlets set into the lid; the whole with a dark glossy worn surface
medium: gourd, snake skin, split cane, metal rings, iron bells, dried seed pods, bird claws, bird feathers and dried wings, six diminutive figure charms
title: Basket with Metal Attachments
